questions.uddipok:
Fill in the blanks with suitable prepositions or articles and zero (×) articles.
Washing hands regularly is (a) ____ important activity. It keeps us safe (b) ____ corona-virus. How you wash your hand is also very (c) ____ important. First, you have to wet your hands (d) ____ clean, running water and apply soap. Then, rub your hands together with (e) ____ soap to create foam. Lather the backs of your hands, (f) ____ your fingers and (g) ____ your nails. Remember, you have to scrub your hands (h) ____ at least 20 seconds. After that rinse your hands well with clean and running water. Finally, dry your hands using (i) ____ clean towel or tissue paper. Learn the process ( j ) ____ washing hands and also educate your friends about it.

sub_questions.explanation: (a) an; (b) from; (c) × \times × ; (d) with; (e) a; (f) between; (g) under; (h) for; (i) a a a ; (j) of,

questions.uddipok:
Change the sentences according to directions:
(a) Only you can do the work. (Negative)
(b) No other friend is as great as books. (Superlative)
(c) The rose is a very nice flower. (Exclamatory)
(d) We should be patriots. (Imperative)
(e) He called it laurel. (Passive)

sub_questions.explanation:
(a) None but you can do the work.
(b) Books are the greatest friend.
(c) What a nice flower the rose is!
(d) Let us be patriots.
(e) It was called laurel by him.

questions.uddipok:
Complete the text adding suffixes, prefixes or the both with the root words given in the parenthesis:
Smoking produces (a) ___ (danger) - effects on man. By smoking a man incurs both physical and (b) ___ (economy) loss. Smoking is a kind of (c) (addict) ___ Those who become (d) ___ (addict) ___ to drug, first begin smoking which is the initial step of addiction. We should raise (e) ___ (aware) ___ among our people. (i) ___ (fortunate) only the (j) ___ (wise) ___ men can do such foolish work.

sub_questions.explanation: (a) dangerous; (b) economic; (c) addiction; (d) addicted; (e) awareness; (f) discourage; (g) impossible; (h) united; (i) Unfortunately; (j) unwise.

questions.uddipok:
Make tag questions with the following statements:
(a) The habit of reading is good, ____ ?
(b) But we hardly find it in us, ____?
(c) Everybody loves a studious student, ____?
(d) We ought to give him books, ____?
(e) Books give us knowledge, ____ ?
(f) To read good books is a choice, ____?
(g) Let us try heart and soul to form this habit, ____ ?

sub_questions.explanation:
(a) The habit of reading is good, isn't it?

(b) But we hardly find it in us, do we?

(c) Everybody loves a studious student, don't they?

(d) We ought to give him books, oughtn't we?

(e) Books give us knowledge, don't they?

(f) To read good books is a choice, isn't it?

(g) Let us try heart and soul to form this habit, shall we?

questions.uddipok:
Use punctuation marks where necessary in the following text.
Shoel asked Alam Friend have you ever visited the National Memorial at Savar in Dhaka Wow how Splendid it is Yes I havent yet gone there said Alam.

sub_questions.explanation:
Sohel asked Alam, "Friend, have you ever visited The National Memorial at Savar in Dhaka? Wow! How splendid it is!" "Yes, I haven't yet gone there," said Alam.
[Note: As there is a negative sentence after yes, yes is considered as a sentence.]

questions.uddipok: Suppose, you are Munir/Mita, a student of Joypara High School, Manikganj. Your School has some computers for the students. But it is very sorry to say that most of the computers are out of order. So, the students cannot get proper facilities for practice. Now, write a complained letter to the Headmaster to take proper steps about this immediately.

sub_questions.explanation:
21 October 2024
The Headmaster Joypara High School, Manikganj
Subject: Complaint for out-of-order computers
Dear Sir,
This is to inform you that a computer lab was set up in our school last year in order to enable the students to acquire technological knowledge. However, it is sad to say that the lab can no longer provide the services: The number of computers in the lab were already insufficient compared to the number of users. And now, most of them are out of order. Consequently, the students cannot get proper facilities for practice.
We, therefore, hope that you would be kind enough to take prompt steps to repair the computers or buy new ones and oblige us thereby.

Yours sincerely,
Mita Islam
Roll-02, Class X
On.behalf of the students of
Joypara High School
